January 2024
Congratulations! Sangwoo Seo and Sungwon Kim received Gold Prize at the 30th Samsung Humantech Paper Award.
Sangwoo Seo and Sungwon Kim received Gold Prize at the 30th Samsung Humantech Paper Award for their paper Interpretable Prototype-based Graph Information Bottleneck published in NeurIPS 2023. The Gold Prize is given to only one paper in Computer Science & Engineering area every year.
